label.en: 18/19 A regular part 1 2.5 CP HV Eng
label.et: 18/19 S PÕ 1. osa 2.5 EAP HV Eng

description.en: Planning, writing and discussing philosophical papers.

objectives.en: To develop student's skills in academic writing, discussion and research.
objectives.et: Arendada erialase akadeemilise diskussiooni, kirjutamise ja uurimistöö oskusi.

learning_outcomes.en: On successful completion of the course, the student has improved her/his research skills, s/he is able to present the results orally and as article manuscript.
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse sooritanud üliõpilane: omab uurimistöövilumusi, oskust oma töö tulemusi esitada suuliselt ja kirjalikult artikli vormis.

independent_work.et: Reading presentation texts, presenting once a semester.

description.et:
PhD students have to attend and participate in all colloquia.
If you need to be away, please send in your comments and questions about the presentation beforehand.

grade_preconditions.et:
PhD students have to attend all colloquia, unless having a reasonable excuse.
If a PhD student is abroad for the whole semester, she needs to do a presentation about her research in progress abroad.
For the missed colloquia, please send in your written comments and questions about the presentation.

grade_evaluation.et:
In order to pass the PhD Seminar, a PhD student has to:
1. give a presentation during the semester,
2. attend the colloquia.

debt_elimination.et: For the missed colloquia, please send in your written comments and questions about the presentation.
